attributes.action: Instruct Gordon Brown or whoever succeeds Tony Blair as PM to immediately hold a General Election as they will have no Mandate to Govern
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whoever succeeds Tony Blair should go to the poles immediately as they will have no Mandate to Govern.

The electorate should demand this happens.

Most of the UK population didnt want Blair anyway so we certainly dont want Brown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
